overview: The man Bannister has sent to investigate the trouble at his mine has disappeared. This time his son Bob goes, quickly learning that Kincade is the culprit. Kincade has been taking gold from the mine and now plans to kidnap Teresa and skip across the border.
tagline: AW WHIRLWIND OF ACTION! - TYPHOON OF THRILLS! - HURRICANE OF EXCITEMENT!
title: Kid Courageous
